definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: SUS 304 structure, resist Acid and Alkali corrosion, 10 years lifespan.
sentences.chinese: 全不锈钢结构，耐酸碱，坚固耐用。

sentences.english: The product can prevent mould from growing. They have excellent performance of acid-resisting and alkali-resisting.
sentences.chinese: 它们能防止霉菌生长，而且耐酸抗碱，性能优越。

sentences.english: The catalyst has the advantages of strong acid-resistant ability and long service life.
sentences.chinese: 本发明的催化剂具有耐酸能力强，寿命长的优点。

sentences.english: All in all, acrylon is an acid-base, the best a dyed.
sentences.chinese: 总之，腈纶是一栽耐酸碱的纤维，最坏一次染成。

sentences.english: Base finish is acid-resistant midnight blue.
sentences.chinese: 基地外层，耐酸午夜蓝色。

sentences.english: Alkali resistant but not acid resistant , and easily damaged by acid-containing substances.
sentences.chinese: 耐碱不耐酸，酸性物质容易使其损伤。

sentences.english: The machine is used for feeding during the process of the charring of the wool and has a good acid resistance.
sentences.chinese: 本机用于羊毛炭化过程中的均匀喂入，耐酸性能好。

sentences.english: Now under development is the method of alumite after jointing aluminum alloy and resin.
sentences.chinese: 现在正在开发的方法后，耐酸铝及铝合金焊接树脂。

sentences.english: The development of acid-resisting calcium carbonate abroad and its research progress were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国外有关耐酸碳酸钙产品的开发和研究进展。

sentences.english: With the characteristic of acid-resisting, corrosion-resisting, wear-resisting, long life time.
sentences.chinese: 具有耐酸性，抗腐蚀，耐老化，使用寿命特长的特点。

sentences.english: Acid-alkali-poor, this is the one reason non-asbestos prescription dominant.
sentences.chinese: 耐酸耐碱较差，这也是无金属配方占主流的一个原因。

sentences.english: Better insulation performance, and cook Acid and Basic Resistance durable, suitable for small fires slow Ye.
sentences.chinese: 有较好的保温性能，且耐酸碱耐久煮，适宜小火慢邺。

sentences.english: Austenitic type stainless steel heat treatment of acid-resistant.
sentences.chinese: 奥氏体型不锈耐酸钢的热处理。

sentences.english: Glass fiber, anti-Oxidative acid treatment, anti-corrosion coating.
sentences.chinese: 玻纤布，抗氧化耐酸碱处理，防腐涂层。

sentences.english: The microspheres have narrow distribution of diameter, excellent mechanical stability and acid-resistivity.
sentences.chinese: 微球粒径分布窄，具有良好的机械稳定性和耐酸性。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
